text: Hey everyone, has anyone ever had to create a dynamic form in HubSpot where you could add additional values? Here is the scenario -> ABC Company wants to send a form to another company and have them fill out a registration list with individual fields for employees(name,emp # etc for each employee attending). Could I set up a dynamic way of doing this with HubSpot forms?
Hey Nick, when I am involved in this process, this info is usually already determined or discussed with the client already. I can ask some of our PM's about it and get back to you.
That would be pretty cool. I don't ever get time to do this type of stuff!  I always talk about doing it, but I never get the time
